attributes.action: Give Equal media attention, funding and investigation to be given to ALL missing children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To include bringing back appropriate pictures/details on MILK or BREAD packets - the common groceries, of ALL missing children. To give more focus and support to MISSING childrens charities and NOT just high profile cases.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has no control over the level of media attention given to any particular missing persons case. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
